thread.section_title: EVEN Hotel Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Location, Lovely Staff, Great Accomodation
thread.title_full: Good Location, Lovely Staff, Great Accomodation - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: fetwen
title: Good Location, Lovely Staff, Great Accomodation
text:
This hotel is very close to the subway, approximately a 5 minute walk and very close to Madison Square Garden if you are going to an event there.
The staff are really helpful and welcoming. It is great to get lovely cool water on your return to the hotel in reception after a day tramping around the city!
The rooms are clean, well organised and comfortable. WE didn't eat any breakfast at the hotel or use any facilities really, so can't comment on those.
The hotel is a bit of a walk from Times Square, but nothing unmanageable. I would stay again and certainly recommend.
